author: alx9r
body:
The progress bar(s) produce by `Get-DscResource` remain visible for the duration of execution well after `Get-DscResource` completes.  Examining the PowerShell.Streams.Progress suggests that PSDesiredStateConfiguration.psm1 does not write a "Completed" record for its activities.  Searching the implementation file by invoking

```PowerShell
Import-Module PSDesiredStateConfiguration -PassThru | 
    % Path | 
    % { Get-Content $_ } | 
    ? {($_ -like '*-Completed*') -or ($_ -like '*Write-Progress*')}
```

outputs

```none
        Write-Progress -Id 1 -Activity $LocalizedData.LoadingDefaultCimKeywords
        Write-Progress -Id 2 -Activity $LocalizedData.GettingModuleList
            Write-Progress -Id 3 -Activity $LocalizedData.CreatingResourceList
```

which suggests that there are no calls to `Write-Progress -Completed` that correspond to the module's activities.

The absence of a "Completed" record differs from other commands like `Invoke-WebRequest` that also write progress.  An example PowerShell.Streams.Progress for an invocation of that command (using the structure of the repro below) includes a "Completed" record as follows:

```none
Name                  Count
----                  -----
0, Processing          1026
0, Completed              1
```


# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
$sb = {Get-DscResource Archive -Module PSDesiredStateConfiguration}
. $sb | Out-Null
sleep 5
$ps = [powershell]::Create().AddScript($sb)
$ps.Invoke() | Out-Null
$ps.Streams.Progress | group ActivityId,RecordType | select Name,Count
```

# Expected behavior

## at sleep

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11237922/80611046-f42c7f00-89ee-11ea-9079-8fb81ef2df9d.png)



## at completion

```none
call complete

Name          Count
----          -----
1, Processing     1
2, Processing     1
3, Processing     1
1, Completed      1
2, Completed      1
3, Completed      1
```


# Actual behavior

## at sleep
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11237922/80611119-0d353000-89ef-11ea-8001-bc0544a15306.png)


## at completion

```none
call complete

Name          Count
----          -----
1, Processing     1
2, Processing     1
3, Processing     1
```
